.e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample {
    padding: 20px;
}

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .e-custom-parent {
        background-color: #6d619b;
        border: 1px solid #3f51b5;
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .e-custom-performance {
        background-color: #ad7a66;
        border: 1px solid #3f51b5;
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .e-custom-moments {
        background-color: #7ab748;
        border: 1px solid #3f51b5;
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .moments, .face-mask, .oscar {
        position: relative;
        top: 1px;
        bottom: 2px;
        left: 5px;
        padding-right: 4px;
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .e-custom-milestone {
        position: absolute !important;
        left: 0px !important;
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .oscar {
        content: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .face-mask {
        content: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
    }

    .e-gantt-taskbar-template-sample .moments {
        content: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
    }

    .e-gantt-gantttaskbartemplate-reference-link {
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }

    .e-gantt-gantttaskbartemplate-reference-link:hover,
    .e-gantt-gantttaskbartemplate-reference-link:focus {
        text-decoration: underline !important;
    }
